title: blucepheus
author: blucepheus
content: Looking for all denominations of loaded silver Casascius, graded and ungraded, singles or in bulk (5-10+). Please PM if you have any you’re willing to part with.Thanks

comments.author: P0rny
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on August 19, 2022, 09:45:17 PMLooking for all denominations of loaded silver Casascius, graded and ungraded, singles or in bulk (5-10+). Please PM if you have any you’re willing to part with.ThanksI have a single unpeeled 1btc brass, am curious as to the price I may get...

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: P0rny on September 04, 2022, 01:15:42 AMQuote from: blucepheus on August 19, 2022, 09:45:17 PMLooking for all denominations of loaded silver Casascius, graded and ungraded, singles or in bulk (5-10+). Please PM if you have any you’re willing to part with.ThanksI have a single unpeeled 1btc brass, am curious as to the price I may get...Thank you, mostly looking for silvers at the moment.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on September 10, 2022, 07:10:34 PMThank you, mostly looking for silvers at the moment. I've got the complete set of silvers...  I had hoped to sell my brass coins before breaking the set up though.  However, money is a loud talker and I'm always looking to score more BTC.  If you want to make me an offer I can't refuse via PM, I'd be open to hearing it.  I'd consider me a last resort though.  There are no doubt people who are less attached to their collection and willing to accept lower offers.
